content:
From: Olga Vovk <ovovk@samvit-solutions.com>
Dear all,
I need to test a few mCODE profiles to decide if they fit for my project purposes.
I wonder what would be the best way to do that?
E.g. is there any publicly available test mCODE FHIR Server? If Yes, could you please to point me to one?
And, if No, what would be the best way to do that?
Please advise,
Thank you!!!

Olga Vovk
<:3)))~~~~

If this is just one time testing you may use FHIR Validator and launch it from the command line. To test resource instances periodically you probably need to build some sort of local FHIR server to validate.

Shamil said:

If this is just one time testing you may use FHIR Validator and launch it from the command line. To test resource instances periodically you probably need to build some sort of local FHIR server to validate.

Hi Shamil, thank you!
I need to test resource instances and see how it works,
Thank you!
Olga
